name: qlik-sense-extension-template
description: A map extension for Qlik Sense for story telling type of apps

scripts.test: pkill -f phantomjs; browserify ./test/test.js --basedir ./ --transform babelify | testling | faucet
scripts.move:css: for file in `cat dependencies-css.txt`; do cp "$file" ./dist/css; done
scripts.deploy: open http://localhost:4848/sense/app/%2FUsers%2Fbjr%2FQlik%2FSense%2FApps%2FConsumer%20Goods%20Sales.qvf/sheet/FFmnDA/state/analysis ; npm run build && npm run move:deploy
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run js && npm run move

author: Johan Lahti <johanlahti@gmail.com>
